titleStmt.title: A godly ballad declaring by the Scriptures the plagues that haue insued whordome
titleStmt.author: A. I., fl. 1566.

publicationStmt.publisher: At the long shop adioining vnto Sainct Mildreds Churche in the Poultrie by John Alde,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Refrain of youth thy vain desire.".
On the verso is printed a fragment of: A prognostication for the year MDLXVII (STC 401.3).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
